title: kungen12321
author: kungen12321
content: Hi!Planning to buy several miner in the price range/hashrate, like antminer 17 serie.Which model and manufacturer would you recommend based on your own experience?Prioritization as follows.1. Reliability2. Highest hashrate vs electricity.3. PriceThanks in advance!

comments.author: kungen12321
comments.body: Quote from: kano on January 08, 2023, 01:25:16 AMNot S17 They're too unreliable.Would you recommend miner model from another company, whatsminer Ebang, Avalon...,?

comments.author: NotFuzzyWarm
comments.body: Star far far away from Ebang! As many unfortunate people here have found out they have zero support for the miners.Whatsminers (MicroBt), Avalons (Canaan) are excellent.

comments.author: kungen12321
comments.body: Quote from: NotFuzzyWarm on January 08, 2023, 05:14:45 PMStar far far away from Ebang! As many unfortunate people here have found out they have zero support for the miners.Whatsminers (MicroBt), Avalons (Canaan) are excellent.Thanks for that knowledge! Some special model you would recommend and not from whatsminer and Avalon?

comments.author: isabellara
comments.body: what are the requirements of pc for mining

comments.author: NotFuzzyWarm
comments.body: Quote from: isabellara on January 09, 2023, 09:47:49 AMwhat are the requirements of pc for mining  Please read https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2415854.0 - mainly point-3...Summary: A PC cannot be used for mining BTC

comments.author: kungen12321
comments.body: Quote from: Jack_Tsai on January 09, 2023, 02:50:26 AMWhy not choose S19To expensive for me.
